tours.title: Unforgettable Adventures in 2025
tours.description: Choose from our carefully curated selection of group tours across Central Asia. Each journey is designed to immerse you in breathtaking landscapes, rich cultures, and unforgettable experiences.
tours.tour_1_description: Explore the iconic Silk Road cities and immerse yourself in Central Asian culture
tours.tour_2_destinations: Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Armenia
tours.tour_2_description: The ultimate Central Asia adventure covering 8 countries and countless wonders
tours.tour_3_description: Discover the hidden gems and breathtaking landscapes of Central Asia

footer.tagline_part1: Your local crew in Uzbekistan. Real adventures,

about.title: About Us

section1.title: What Makes Us Unique
section1.description: We focus on sharing the joy of travel. For over 35 years, we have been guiding travelers around the world so they can experience the real, the rare, and the remarkable. We are grateful for what travel gives us – and we give back through Pilav Tour, supporting communities across the globe, proudly holding B Corp certification since 2018.

section2.title: Don't know where to go next?
section2.description:
Dreaming of a journey created just for you?

Click “Contact us”, fill out a short form — and we’ll turn your ideas into the perfect itinerary.

about.hero_description_part1: A bunch of locals who love showing off our country.
about.hero_description_part2: No scripts. No tour buses. Just real adventures.
about.story_paragraph1: Back in 2005, we were just three friends from Samarkand who noticed tourists were missing all the good stuff.
about.story_paragraph2: The real plov spots. The hidden courtyards. The artisans who've been making ceramics for six generations.
about.story_paragraph3: So we started showing people around. Word spread. Travelers started asking for more. 20 years later, we're still doing the same thing – just better.
about.values_born_here_description: We grew up in these streets. This is home.
about.values_small_crews_description: Max 12 people. Big groups = boring trips.
about.values_food_first_description: We plan trips around meals. Priorities.
about.values_real_connections_description: Not actors. Real families, real artisans.
about.plan_your_adventure: Let's plan your Uzbekistan adventure together.

CulturalHighlights.description: Uzbekistan isn't just pretty buildings. It's the food, the crafts, the people who make you feel like family.
CulturalHighlights.handmade_magic_description: Watch masters create pottery, silk, and art using ancient techniques.
CulturalHighlights.eat_like_a_local_description: Legendary plov, fresh samsa, secret tea spots. Food is our thing.
CulturalHighlights.real_stories_description: Meet the people. Hear the stories. Feel the warmth.

WhyPilavtour.description: We're locals who love showing off our country. No scripts, no BS – just real adventures.
WhyPilavtour.local_know_how_description: Born and raised here. We know the secret spots.
WhyPilavtour.small_crews_only_description: Max 12 people. Real connections, not tour groups.
WhyPilavtour.food_obsessed_description: The best plov spots. Home-cooked meals. Street eats.
WhyPilavtour.flex_it_your_way_description: Every trip can be customized. Your pace, your style.
WhyPilavtour.real_experiences_description: Meet artisans. Eat with families. Make memories.
